flawed_nl_solution:
Maurice buys 4 * 5 = <<4*5=20>>20 pounds of ground beef.
If 2 pounds of ground beef make a burger, then he can make 20/2 = 10 burgers.
Given that Maurice will have 1 burger, he can invite 10-1 = <<10-1=11>>11 people
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
